This is the full DVD content in a .avi file, the total running time is 51 minutes.  Thanks for the upload I hadn't seen this anywhere else.

This is the entire Chair Fit DVD but Flirty Girl has multiple fitness dvd's. There are 4 dvd's in the Teaser collection which is what they call the videos that are pure fitness. There is also the Pole collection which are just videos you use with the pole. There are 3 in that collection. In The Teaser Collection there's: Booty Beat, Just Teasing, Chair Fit, and Chair Dancing. If anyone finds the other 3 dvd's please let me know. Thanks ^_^
